speaker: Ty
text: Wow, it's our first day in Vũng Tàu.

speaker: Ty
text: What do you think about kayaking? Want to try it?

speaker: Na
text: It doesn't seem safe to me.

speaker: Ty
text: How do you feel about rock climbing?

speaker: Na
text: How about we try another activity?

speaker: Ty
text: Do you think bungee jumping looks fun?

speaker: Na
text: Um, no. That is the scariest thing I have ever seen.

speaker: Ty
text: So, what do you want to do?

speaker: Na
text: I just want to walk around today
